summary: Fixed GD extension issue by installing php8.4-gd package. The error 'Call to undefined function imagecreatetruecolor()' was resolved. Restarted Laravel development server. Login page is now loading (HTTP 200). The page shows login form but may still display debug information if APP_DEBUG is enabled.
current_status: GD extension installed and working. Server restarted. Login page accessible at http://127.0.0.1:8000/login/backoffice. Application should now work properly for testing BeautyBooking module.
